attributes.action: Return anti social behaviour to the Police
attributes.additional_details: Anti Social behaviour to be returned to the police authority, so that there is a 24 hour service where anti social behaviour can be dealt with. At present anti social behaviour inside a house comes under the jurisdiction of the local council. Who will not have the resources for a 24 hour service. So the ludicrous situation can arise where an all night party is causing a nuisance in a private property. People will just have to suffer the noise till it stops as the police are powerless to deal with the incident.
